name: SymbiNode
description:
Symbinode is a 2D Bullet Hell game where you collect weapons and connect them to yourself for your final fight with the World Eater. 

World 🗺️

Simmie was a powerful symbiote soldier who can take an army on its own with its ability to wield a diverse set of weapons. One day, on a mission to investigate the rumors about a savage symbiote gone rogue, Simmie came across something he had never witnessed before.

A symbiote, one of his own, so strong and full of hatred that it's incomprehensible. This beast was devouring anything on its path without a single thought on its mind. 

The evil symbiote noticed Simmie, and gave a menacing stare. Simmie tried to escape, but while doing so, he lost all of weapons.

Stripped of all his prized tools, Simmie was still not about to give up anytime soon. He plucked up his courage, puffed his chest and started to fight with whatever he has got. This, was his redemption. 

Controls ⌨️

WASD - Move

Mouse - Rotate

Features

  • ⚔️ A fast & juicy gameplay.
  • 👺 5+ challenging creatures to battle.
  • 👗 5+ unique items to collect & combine.
  • ☠️ 1 challenging bosses to defeat.
  • 🕘 can be long hours of playtime.
  • 🎶 An original soundtrack of 2 tracks.
  • 🎨Original and stylistic art style.

This game is made for HUJAM'22, theme was "Space".

All of the assets made by us.
